## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`oddjob`](#oddjob): This class ensures that the basic oddjobd service is running and provides for an entry point to other oddjob functions and configuration.

## Classes

### <a name="oddjob"></a>`oddjob`

This class ensures that the basic oddjobd service is running and
provides for an entry point to other oddjob functions and
configuration.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `oddjob` class:

* [`package_ensure`](#-oddjob--package_ensure)

##### <a name="-oddjob--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

The ensure status of package to be managed

Default value: `simplib::lookup('simp_options::package_ensure', { 'default_value' => 'installed' })`

### <a name="oddjob--mkhomedir"></a>`oddjob::mkhomedir`

class oddjob::mkhomedir

This configures the oddjob-mkhomedir

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `oddjob::mkhomedir` class:

* [`umask`](#-oddjob--mkhomedir--umask)
* [`package_ensure`](#-oddjob--mkhomedir--package_ensure)

##### <a name="-oddjob--mkhomedir--umask"></a>`umask`

Data type: `Simplib::Umask`



Default value: `'0027'`

##### <a name="-oddjob--mkhomedir--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

The ensure status of packages to be managed

Default value: `simplib::lookup('simp_options::package_ensure', { 'default_value' => 'installed' })`
